import{useSelector}from'react-redux';import{Col,Row}from'reactstrap';// import DisplayCard from './DisplayCard';
import AnimatedDisplayCard from'./AnimatedDisplayCard';import{selectFeaturedCampsite}from'../campsites/campsitesSlice';import{selectFeaturedPromotion}from'../promotions/promotionsSlice';import{selectFeaturedPartner}from'../partners/partnersSlice';import Loading from'../../components/Loading';import Error from'../../components/Error';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DisplayList=()=>{const items=useSelector(state=>[selectFeaturedCampsite(state),selectFeaturedPromotion(state),selectFeaturedPartner(state)]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{className:"row-content align-items-center",children:items.map((item,idx)=>{const{featuredItem,isLoading,errMsg}=item;if(isLoading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Loading,{},idx);}if(errMsg){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Error,{errMsg:errMsg},idx);}return featuredItem&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{md:true,className:"m-1",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AnimatedDisplayCard,{item:featuredItem})},idx);})});};export default DisplayList;
